name: Aria2 AriaNg
description: Aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink. AriaNg is a modern web frontend making aria2 easier to use with a responsive interface that works on desktop and mobile devices.
short_desc: Aria2 download manager with AriaNg web UI
author: hurlenko
